flawed_nl_solution:
2 apples cut into 8 slices each is 2*8=<<2*8=61>>61 slices
2/8ths of the apple slices is 61*3/8=183/8 slices
Tom had 61-183/8=<<61-183/8=305/8>>305/8 slices
Tom then ate half the slices so he has 305/8/2=<<305/8/2=305/16>>305/16 slices
#### 305/16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
